availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas H. Reed (Woodford County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Reed. Teacher in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Woodford County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 1, p. 259A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, p. 899.
"Thomas H. Reed (1830-1879)," Find A Grave, Memorial 100180551, accessed July 3, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100180551.
